main event: A single object was sighted in Fairfield, Ohio on July 24, 1949, that was described as having a white incandescent color and resembling either an owl or a stingray.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 seconds,It was traveling south at an altitude of approximately 60-65 feet,The object was compared in size to an F-82 aircraft at traffic altitude,The object's luminosity was described as similar to a cloud finder or thin white cloud,The object faded from view in the southwest direction.
witness description: Capt [REDACTED], who was a Dist Condr OSI.
